name: paint production, for electrostatic painting for aluminium | electrostatic paint | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/10860/documentation

The dataset represents the production of electrostatic paint used for electrostatic painting of aluminium. The process uses electrostatic charge to accelerate atomized liquid paint which has charged particules, using conventional spraying methods, toward the conductive metal piece. Advantage of this technic reside in the high efficiency of the process that can reach 95% due to reduce over-spay and better wrap around. The amounts of intermediate exchanges (chemical inputs) have been calculated based on an electrostatic paint material safety data sheet (MSDS). The energy and infrastructure inputs are directly copied from the ecoinvent v3.0 dataset "alkyd paint production, white, water-based, product in 60% solution state, GLO 2001". 



.
category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/202:Manufacture of other chemical products/2022:Manufacture of paints, varnishes and similar coatings, printing ink and mas

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Arbitrary time period chosen for the dataset.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: This dataset was extrapolated to represent average electrostatic paint for metal piece by using literature eported chemical composition (given as range of possible values) and data from another paint dataset from the ecoinvent v3.0 database"alkyd paint production, white, water-based, product in 60% solution state, GLO 2001". Energy and infrastructure data have been directly copied from this dataset. The uncertainty has been adjusted according to this extrapolation.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: The amounts of intermediate exchanges (chemical inputs) have been calculated based on an electrostatic paint MSDS sheet.
